item.title: td.T
item.description: Constructing *td.T import ( "testing" "github.com/maxatome/go-testdeep/td" ) func TestMyFunc(tt *testing.T) { t := td.NewT(tt) t.Cmp(MyFunc(), 12) } func NewT(t TestingFT, config ...ContextConfig) *T func Assert(t TestingFT, config ...ContextConfig) *T func Require(t TestingFT, config ...ContextConfig) *T func AssertRequire(t TestingFT, config ...ContextConfig) (*T, *T) Configuring *td.T func TestMyFunc(tt *testing.T) { t := td.NewT(tt).UseEqual().RootName("RECORD") ... } func (t *T) BeLax(enable ...bool) *T func (t *T) FailureIsFatal(enable ...bool) *T func (t *T) RootName(rootName string) *T func (t *T) UseEqual(enable .
